Section.Para: The RXFContainersStatic subject contains metaclasses for the static container classes delivered with the Realtime eXecution Framework RXF that allow working with static memory only.
The number of elements that can be stored in the static memory pool of the list.
The value of this property will be used as container size for all unbounded containers (with a multiplicity of *).
The number of elements that can be stored in the static memory pool of the list.
The value of this property will be used as container size for all unbounded containers (with a multiplicity of *).
